description:
Rokuta is worried about the conditions of the world made of 12 kingdoms and Kokai.  Ko and Ho are in bad shape because they don’t have a king.  The worst is Tai.  Tai-o and Taiki are missing.  Rokuta remembers Taiki whom he brought back from Horai.  If Taiki is dead Tai’s new Ranka should be growing on Shashinboku Tree in Mt. Ho but there’s no sign of it.  Rokuta is still looking for Taiki.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaze no Umi, Meikyuu no Kishi - Tenshou
The Sea of Wind, The Shore of The Maze - Transition Chapter
風の海 迷宮の岸 転章
